required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of SHR-1209 in the Treatment of Hypercholesterolemia and Hyperlipidemia Ⅲ Stage
clinical_study.official_title: Phase III, Multicentre, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Trial Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of SHR-1209 Monotherapy in Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia and Mixed Hyperlipemia

brief_summary.textblock: The study is ongoing to evaluate the efficacy and safety of SHR-1209 in patients with hypercholesterolemia and hyperlipemia.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: 12-weeks or 16weeks Percentage change in LDL-C relative to baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: 12-weeks or 16weeks change in LDL-C relative to baseline；
Percentage of changes in non-HDL-C, ApoB, TC/HDL-C, ApoB/ApoA1, LP (a) and TG relative to baseline and relative to baseline after 12 weeks or 16 weeks of treatment

facility.name: Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University
